text: Homilae or Homilai () was a town in Oetaea in ancient Thessaly. The town's name appears in an epigraph dated to 206/5 BCE as providing a hieromnemone to the Amphictyonic League on behalf of the Aetolians. Its site is at the modern site of Kouvelo Kastro/Kastro Orias. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Oetaea
title: Homilae
